name: kinectron-client

scripts.start: npm run clean && parcel watch src/index.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && parcel serve tools/connection-tester/index.html --open
scripts.test:stream: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.js --no-optimize && parcel serve tools/stream-tester/index.html --open

author: Lisa Jamhoury and Shawn Van Every
